name: [COLD]-冷
description:
[COLD]-冷

A little Yume Nikki Fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

You play as Aruben who wakes up in a strange place, surviving and exploring his COLD dreams.

Two doors, one road, three effects and no ending yet.

All music in this game is made by shirleycrow.

This game is still in development. Please contact me if you find any bugs.

[Control]

- Move/Choose: ↑↓←→

- Check: Enter

- Wake Up: 9 or use Menu

- Confirm: Z/space/Enter

- Cancel: X/esc

- Full screen: F4

Interact with a lit campfire to keep body warm and save the game.

Big thanks to this game's testers:

Karen, JokerM and at.
